title: Paramedic
desc:
Post 52
***911 Dispatch***
Choose several players based on your score (0-33% = 1, 34-66% = 2, 67-100% = 3). You will increase their defense power based on how many are attacked (1 = 0.3x, 2 = 0.2x, 3+ = 0.1x).
***Advanced Trauma Training** (1x, Locked)*
Unlocked if you place in the top 3. Use in conjunction with 911 Dispatch, and the granted defense power will be doubled.
***Overtime** (Passive)*
Triggered if your standard deviation is above 27.50%. Any defense power boost from 911 Dispatch is decreased by 0.1x. However, you may target one additional player with 911 Dispatch.
